document.full_text: larry hagman may be putting on his cowboy hat and boots again and heading back to "dallas," but off-screen the actor is selling his own ranch, and some of the memorabilia from the classic 1980s tv show.
document.title: "dallas" actor larry hagman sells off the ranch
lines_and_colors: larry hagman may be putting on his cowboy hat and boots again and heading back to "dallas," but off-screen the actor is selling his own ranch, and some of the memorabilia from the classic 1980s tv show.
